body_html:
@arose13 There are actually two different packages tensorflow and tensorflow-gpu. However, PyTorch doesn't have a different package for GPU.
But I agree it can be/is difficult to set up tensorflow-gpu as compared to PyTorch. But here is a thing, Why not get docker Image of tensorflow-gpu and use it instead. Here are the docs on how to get it.
body_text:
@arose13 There are actually two different packages tensorflow and tensorflow-gpu. However, PyTorch doesn't have a different package for GPU.
But I agree it can be/is difficult to set up tensorflow-gpu as compared to PyTorch. But here is a thing, Why not get docker Image of tensorflow-gpu and use it instead. Here are the docs on how to get it.
body:
@arose13 There are actually two different packages `tensorflow` and `tensorflow-gpu`. However, PyTorch doesn't have a different package for GPU.
But I agree it can be/is difficult to set up `tensorflow-gpu` as compared to PyTorch. But here is a thing, Why not get docker Image of `tensorflow-gpu` and use it instead. Here are the [docs](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/tree/master/tensorflow/tools/dockerfiles) on how to get it.
